title: Pokonyan! (Rocky Rackat!)
synopsis: Rocky Rackat (Pokonyan) is a funny little creature that's a bit of a cross between a cat and a raccoon. There are rumors that he may be a lunar cat, however this is not a documented fact, he may be a bit looney at times, yet his origin remains a mystery.
staff: [['Sasagawa, Hiroshi', ['Director']], ['Iwasaki, Yoshiaki', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Sakurai, Masaaki', ['Script']], ['Yukimuro, Shunichi', ['Script', ' Series Composition']]]
